title: ICT-Integrated Mathematics Learning Design: Simulation/VR-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: High school mathematics fundamentals (functions, geometry, calculus)
context.additional_context: Real-time collaboration and mathematical problem-solving projects in VR simulation environments using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze spatial geometry problems and propose solutions using 3D geometric models in a VR environment.
Learners can visualize calculus concepts (differentiation/integration) with simulation tools to solve applied problems (e.g., optimization, physics modeling).
Learners can receive comprehensive evaluations of collaborative project outcomes with peers using ICT tools (collaboration platforms, VR apps).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
